ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm Change
ygData.msgSnippet: A good friend and guildmate of mine, Tularane attended the event. As a bard, naturally I was curious as to who got the scales. When I heard that 2 dropped (
ygData.messageBody:
A good friend and guildmate of mine, Tularane attended the event. As a bard,
naturally I was curious as to who got the scales. When I heard that 2
dropped ( has it always been that she drops two?), I said to myself that I
needed to get my alt up and Vox capable. If our guild would host it, we'd
fully random the scales, not to bards only. I was thinking that if everyone
can roll on the scale(s), more people may attend. It's already stated that
if one of our guildmates or allied members win the lotto, they will give me
the scale. I don't know how fair it all sounds, but as the hosting guild, we
could actually claim a dragonscale to our own, no matter what but we aren't.
It doesn't seem so underhanded if you think about it. :) A kill is a kill.
What is done with the loot is up to the hosting party, and we want to be
fair as we can!

As of last weekend, I have everything but the 2 dragonscales and trak guts,
and the minor metal bits. (Like the NPC can't make his own darn bits...)
hehe

Pava
CT
